availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Tennessee soldier. Served in the 25th Tennessee Volunteer Infantry Regiment (C.S.A.) as lieutenant, captain, and colonel from August 1, 1861 to March 17, 1865.

ab.bibl:
Will T. Hale and Dixon L. Merritt, A History of Tennessee and Tennesseans (Chicago: Lewis Publishing Company, 1913), 652.
Joseph H. Crute Jr., _Units of the Confederate Army (Midlothian, VA: Derwent Books, 1987), p. 298.
Compiled Service Records of Confederate Soldiers Who Served in Organizations from the State of Tennessee NARA RG 109, Microfilm Series M268, Roll 0223.
Tennesseans in the Civil War: A Military History of Confederate and Union Units with Available Rosters of Personnel , part I (Nashville: University of Tennessee Press), 225-26.
